note.p: Daughter of Joseph Day and his wife, Mary Parker. Lived with Mary Parker’s daughter, also Mary Parker, in Ashbourne, Derbyshire. Probably died in Ashbourne.
Birmingham, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 March 2017)
Derbyshire, England, select Church of England parish registers, 1538–1910 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 March 2017)
letter from E. A. Greaves, 26 June 1878
